metadata.title: CVE-2020-22678 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in gpac 0.8.0. Thegf_media_nalu_remove_emulation_bytes function in av_parsers.c has aheap-based buffer overflow which can lead to a denial of service (DOS) viaa crafted input.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
